imdb.title: Dorei-ku The Animation
imdb.plot: What if you could enslave anyone you ever wanted? Well, this comes close. The SCM lets you enslave anyone who is also wearing an SCM, at a price. One must win over the other, at anything, in order for the other to become their slave.

episodes.title: Choice
episodes.plot: After a chance encounter, Yuuga and Eia agree to test themselves using a mysterious device called SCM. Lucie looks for the man who wronged her to seek revenge.

episodes.title: Restriction
episodes.plot: Yuuga and Eiya challenge two people to a game, exploring the boundaries of the SCM.

episodes.title: Abuse
episodes.plot: Seiya is found out by Eiya and Yuuga. Meanwhile, two people are confronted with what using the SCM truly means.

episodes.title: Plan
episodes.plot: Ela runs into an old Friend. Later, Zero is approached by a little Boy who needs help avenging his father that died because of the SCM.

episodes.title: Bewilderment
episodes.plot: Zero unintentionally reveals new information about the SCM. Meanwhile, Eia and Yuuga disagree over how to proceed with their plan.

episodes.title: Awareness
episodes.plot: Zushiohmaru recalls his time before reuniting with Eia. Despite his confidence, Yuuga quickly finds himself over his head.

episodes.title: Servitude
episodes.plot: Julia recalls her life before the SCM. Meanwhile, Fujiko attempts to win more slaves.

episodes.title: Discovery
episodes.plot: Julia infiltrates a high school to gather information about a mysterious SCM user. Eia and Yuuga duel someone.

episodes.title: Intersection
episodes.plot: While waiting for Julia, Ryuuou and Zero are challenged to a duel by a stranger where Ryuuou learns about a dangerous flaw in the SCM.

episodes.title: Fall
episodes.plot: With Julia still missing, Ataru and the others attempt to rescue her, despite not receiving direct orders. Meanwhile, Maria does what she can to protect Zero.

episodes.title: Harvest
episodes.plot: After learning that Sachi was taken hostage, Eia and the others create a plan to rescue her with unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: Explosion
episodes.plot: An unexpected alliance forms in order to rescue Julia and the others.
